name: Trapped (itch) (Muulk)
description:
Survive in the dark!

Shoot zombies with LMB.

Pick up/drop flashlight with E.

You cannot shoot while holding the flashlight!

Pick up batteries from chests and dead zombies to power your flashlight. 

Zombies will drop health!

Game designed and developed by Muulk.

Open source assets from:

Player and enemy by Riley Gombart

Hole adapted from JohSur's art

Chest by Daniel Cook

Music by teckpow

Hurt sound by Emopreben

Zombie noise by artisticdude
